column4: Hi i have a 4th Gen Ipod, and banshee says that it is working for it... but the ipod does not say that it is synchronizing when banshee says that it is doing stuff... help?
Hi i have a 4th Gen Ipod, and banshee says that it is working for it... but the ipod does not say that it is synchronizing when banshee says that it is doing stuff... help?
where would i check that for banshee?
